Schematic diagram of voltage_divider.cir

Netlist: voltage_divider.cir

"Voltage Divider Circuit"
* Simple voltage divider with 2 resistors and 10V DC source
* Output voltage = Vin * R2/(R1+R2)

V1 in 0 {V_in}
R1 in out {R1}
R2 out 0 {R2}

.end
